{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20587v1", "title": "Connectedness properties of small minimal clusters in Riemannian or
  Finsler manifolds", "summary": "We prove that in a compact Riemannian manifold, the $m$-minimal clusters of
sufficiently small total volume are connected and with small diameter, while in
a more general Finsler manifold they are done by at most $m$ connected
components of small diameter. We apply these results to calculate the
asymptotic expansion of the multi-isoperimetric profile at the first nontrivial
order, for small volumes.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA,math.DG", "published": "2025-04-29T09:40:43Z"}
